TopicTitle: HMS Scott Manley- 750 ton Fleet Flagship

Articles.Content:
The largest warship I've ever built, dedicated to the most peaceful KSP player as it's too massive and laggy to ever be used for more than just looking at. In homage to our fearless leader.

Comes equipped with 6 guided missiles, with capable carry of 22 internally plus 4 more or a fighter compliment.

[URL]http://www./download/kr35iqlifxkct44/Manley+-+Class.craft[/URL]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SpLSCaS.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nUGHUaf.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h4r6KJx.jpg[/IMG] Edited November 17, 2015 by zekes
I... Want... But.. My computer sucks.
How many parts? I bet I could run that.
Does it still have a high TWR? At one point it was higher then one IIRC.

[quote name='gag09']Does it still have a high TWR? At one point it was higher then one IIRC.[/QUOTE]

5 Vectors = 5MN of thrust. So that's a TWR of 0.68 at Kerbin.
Unless there are hidden engines.

Anyway, a gorgeous ship!

[quote name='pTrevTrevs']How many parts? I bet I could run that.[/QUOTE]
That looks to be about almost 500 parts.
Very nice and very impressive Zekes!
Can we see I picture from the front? It looks great!

Peaceful, did you watch the rods from the gods video:D

-JT
who rated this a 3 star or lower? they outta be tossed out an airlock. near Kerbol.

EPIC. Turning on all the lights probably would crash KSP.

Ok... Here is whats gonna happend after i come home from work - download it, put it in orbit, build a figther and blast it of from the space! :-D

I quite like it, but my space battle ship of choice will still be XC-305 and XF-100. They were so pure and functional.

Not enough Scott Manley...needs more Scott Manley....make it 900 tons, and we will classify it as 'Worthy of Bearing the Title Scott Manley'

Will download soon...once RAM on computer is fixed :)

Impressive!

[s]Mine's still bigger[/s] COUGH nobody said anything... xP Really, it is impressive. A lot of space battleships have been posted that seem too small to me, so I like how this one is big enough for a good dozen or so crewmembers and plenty of munitions.
Holy fajitas! I can FEEL the lag already! xD
Zeke what did i tell you about trying to break you computer
